name: Total Posts
author: Eric Hamby

sections.description:
This will allow you to display exacly how many posts total are on your blog.

For more information on the plugin visit: http://vasthtml.com/js/total-posts-plugin/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload total-comments folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Please visit http://vasthtml.com/js/total-posts-plugin/ for usage instructions.
sections.faq:
May I recommend some new features?

Yes please do. http://vasthtml.com/support/

Where can I get support?

At the support forums on Vast HTML: http://vasthtml.com/support/

I need some help modifying this. Can you help?

Yes I can. http://vasthtml.com/contact/ and let me know what you need.

short_description: shows how many posts are on your Wordpress blog.
